title: How to Make Cherry Ale

text: Remove the stems from the cherries. Wash the cherries and prick them all over with a sterilized needle. Dissolve the sugar in the beer. Pour over the fruit in a large container. Add the yeast. Cover the container. Ferment. Once it has fermented, strain well and bottle the ale.
